events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, demonstrating strong coding skills and relevant project experience.
The application of John Doe was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to his software development background and technical skills.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's recruitment process for the Software Engineer role.
Initial screening call with John went well, revealing strong knowledge in software architecture and problem-solving techniques.
John has responded promptly confirming his availability for the technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview with John Doe was scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM, focusing on data structures, algorithms, and system design.
